channel.title: [317] Project Rainbow [317]
channel.description:
[center][b]Project Rainbow[/b]
[img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/splash.png[/img]
We are a semi-successful server, ranking #49 on a very famous RSPS website (I apologize that it is not Mopar, again it is solely my blame), However, we would like some more help with modelling and programming as our game is not even close to perfect, I hope that I can find some willing helpers to help me with this server,
[b]So what are we..?[/b]
We are a 317 revision server with customs!
In October of 2010, I decided to create a server, something different however: a server solely based on customs. Something that would defy every single server; a half decent server filled with custom items!
[b] Original to Rainbow: [/b] Pyramid of Zen - a fun pvp minigame coded by Whac and Im Hunter Skeletons - get points by killing a variety of skeletons! Perfect custom made ::afk system (unique and not gay like the rest) Email system (records email, fool proof (at least for the first time :P)) Unnull system (owners can load players' backup files) Token shop (2 bil tax bags = 2 billion coins) Rainbow points system for many boss npc kills XHP (unlimited hp for all, owners can turn it on, players can turn it off for themselves) ::save and ::backup to ensure that you are never nulled Working restart via command, playersaves work Perfect IPlogs with proper date, very useful Tradelogs, yelllogs, pmlogs working perfectly Unsafepk - The only place where you lose stuff PVP Drops system (custom made) PVP point shops Lottery system SYI proof without limiting one IP per person (long playernames, GF :D) View bans, ipbans, banlogs, iplogs via command! Master password system, works PERFECT Custom yell colors (eg, purple, dark green, gray) Toggleyell so regular players cannot yell Impersonate (fake yells for any name, via the getYellTitle method) PCbans (stores file on pc, unfinished!) Command listener, sees what every player types! :) Debug system (sendquest id's, technical stuff, etc) Forcedialog (npc dialog pops up, custom message!) Forcetalk (they say something you input) Special yell that only staff members can see Owners can open players websites NPCreset does not affect jad anymore Rep++ and Rep-- system once a day ALL DUPES ARE PATCHED (drop dupe, accept decline dupe, trade yourself dupe) The flower game (random mithril seeds) Claws spec works PKban system PERFECT Tempban system PERFECT Mute and IP mute system PERFECT Jail and IP jail system PERFECT PRC system, owners can private tele players, even staffs cannot interrupt them! Only players on a rights list can ban, mute, promote, demote, restart, etc Swap system (swap coords with a player) Get item name via id! Working energy replenish Forget system (uses a for loop to pickup mass amounts of consecutive items) Save Account PK trading is GONE FOREVER Autologin (we like player count) Random chat FX, but you can change it too! Custom items... :O
Our former coder Wildy Own1 has worked for Jagex (this is the one that has retired, I bet 97% of you will not believe it)
[b]Please DO NOT press the back button because you hate customs,[/b] I understand that 98% of you will call me a retard/idiot for having 500+ customs, but why should that discourage you from helping? After all, this is server development, to improve servers.
Now the question is, can [b]you[/b] help us out?
[b] Our Staffs (that do actual work): [/b] Whac - founder, secondary programmer, security manager, client tampering Salthesexy - current lead programmer Wildy Own1 - former lead programmer, website programmer Im Hunter - programming Versa - graphics Blackstar - graphics Bluepike - graphics Racecar - modeller
[b]Pictures [/b] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/2.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/3.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/4.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/5.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/6.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/7.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/8.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/9.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/10.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/12.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/13.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/14.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/15.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/16.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/17.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/18.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/19.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/10.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/21.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/22.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/23.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/24.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/25.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/26.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/27.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/28.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/29.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/30.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/31.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/32.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/33.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/34.png[/img] [img]http://projectrainbow.net/pictures/35.png[/img]
Base: Delta and proud
Player Count: 15-45
If you are interested, please reply. [u]Excuse me for making some of the above content sound like advertising,[/u] I copied a bit from our status page.
[b] Application Format:[/b] Name: Age: Your desired role: How long do you plan to help? How much do you know about Java? (?/10) How many years have you worked (not played) with private servers? Proof or evidence of your previous work?
[/center]
